feed.title: CLBOSS v0.13 aka "Born to Run" Release

entry.title: CLBOSS v0.13 aka "Born to Run" Release
entry.summary: The email announces the release of CLBOSS, which is now compliant with modern CLN versions. The main focus of this release was to revive the project. The email expresses gratitude towards Ken for taking the initiative to bring the project back to life. The release marks an important milestone for CLBOSS. [1] - The link provided leads to more information about CLBOSS and its features.
